content: > carol sanders who created this pattern from studying an historic 1800 s shawl asks that you not sell this pattern or knit it to sell just freely share it with others and please give credit where it is due this pattern is presented in carol s original format enjoy now archived 1 **materials ** approx 550 size s to 650 size l yards worsted or dk weight yarn size 10½ needles size 10 dp needles note the larger shawl is made by working two or more extra points in the body of the shawl 1 https //web archive org/web/20190210134745/http //www cheryloberle com/favoritethings html#top1
